snippet: On Sunday, Target began selling a special edition of Warhol-themed soup cans to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Pop artist's first paintings of Campbell's soup cans.
abstract: On Sunday, Target began selling a special edition of Warhol-themed soup cans to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Pop artist's first paintings of Campbell's soup cans.

headline.main: Warhol Soup Cans, Now at Your Local Target
headline.print_headline: Now in Aisle 3, Warhol Soup Cans
